feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-07-21T11:58:03.287529Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;我用 Rust 编写了一个 JVM</stitle>; <id>;https://andreabergia.com/blog/2023/07/i-have-writing-a-jvm-in-rust/</id>; <updated>;202 3-07-21T08：56：11.151778Z </更新>; <link href =“https://andreabergia.com/blog/2023/07/i-have-writing-a-jvm-in-rust/”/>; <作者>; <名称>;lukastyrychtr </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user？id=lukastyrychtr</uri>; </作者>; <content type =“html” ">;<img src="https://andreabergia.com/images/2023/07/gc1.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：103px；" />;<br />;我用 Rust 编写了一个 Java 虚拟机，称为 rjvm。它是一个出于学习目的而构建的玩具 JVM，而不是一个严肃的实现。它支持执行字节码指令、处理局部变量和堆栈元素以及调用方法。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#i-have-writing-a-jvm-in-rust" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36811554" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;大型强子对撞机内部三重态磁体的淬灭导致小泄漏，造成严重后果</stitle>; <id>;https://home.cern/news/news/accelerators/accelerator-report-quench-lhc-inner-triplet-magnet-causes-small-leak-major</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T07:56:11.286184Z</updated>; <link href="https://home.cern/news/news/accelerators/accelerator-report-quench-lhc-inner-triplet-magnet-causes-small-leak-major"/>; <author>; <name>;untilted</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=untilted</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cds.cern.ch/images/CE RN-HOMEWEB-PHO-2023-098-1/file?size=large" style="宽度：220px；高度：165px；" />;<br />;由于电扰动，大型强子对撞机光束在碰撞仅 9 分钟后就被倾倒了。包括内部三重态磁体在内的几个超导磁体被淬灭，低温电路和绝缘真空之间出现小泄漏。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#quench-of-lhc-inner-triplet-magnet-causes-a-small-leak-with-major-consequences" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36811018" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <条目 xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;欧盟人工智能法案，第一部机器学习法律，预计将于 2024 年初生效</stitle>; <id>;https://www.infoq.com/news/2023/07/eu-ai-act/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T11:03:11.288095Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.infoq.com/news/2023/07/eu-ai-act/"/>; <author>; <name>;elras</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=elras</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://imgopt.infoq.com//fit-in/218x500/filters:quality(100)/filters:no_ upscale()/sponsorship/topic/e5a2abb7-8037-4a40-803d-b51b90d14830/MonteCarloJuly27Webinar-RSB-1688631614287.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：179px；" />;<br />;欧盟人工智能法案是第一部机器学习法律，预计将于 2024 年初生效。该法案采用基于风险的方法，旨在避免在执行法规时出现不成比例的规定。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#eu-ai-act-the-first-ml-law-is-expected-to-come-into-force-by-early-2024" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36812337" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </ent ry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Fly.io Postgres 集群已关闭 3 天，他们没有任何消息</stitle>; <id>;https://webcache.googleusercontent.com/search?q=cache:2T9NpG8thZgJ:https://community.fly.io/t/service-interruption-cant-destroy-machine-deploy-or-re start/14227&cd=9&hl=en&ct=clnk&gl=au</id>; <更新>;2023-07-20T23:56:11.288925Z</更新>; <link href="https://webcache.googleusercontent.com/search?q=cache:2T9NpG8thZgJ:https://community.fly.io/t/service-interruption-cant-destroy- machine-deploy-or-restart/14227&cd=9&hl=en&ct=clnk&gl=au"/>; <author>; <name>;burnerbob</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=burnerbob</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://global.discourse-cdn.com/business7/uploads/fly1/original/2X/ 6/6c0156ccc5696c58a720d8d900de3fd31ca2f109.png" style="宽度：220px; height: 109px;" />;<br />;Fly.io Postgres 集群已关闭 3 天，公司没有任何通信。用户无法重新启动或销毁已停止的机器实例，并且他们的应用程序和数据库遇到问题。人们对 Fly.io 缺乏信息和更新感到沮丧和担忧。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#fly-io-postgres-cluster-down-for-3-days-no-word-from-them-about -it" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36808296" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;能够看到专业知识是值得追求的里程碑</stitle>; <id >;https://commoncog.com/seeing-expertise-milestone-worth-aiming-for/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-21T07:56:11.290528Z</updated>; <link href="https://commoncog.com/seeing-expertise-milestone-worth-aiming-for/"/>; <作者>; <name>;nickwritesit </name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator。 com/user?id=nickwritesit</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://commoncog.com/content/images/2022/04/kl_judo_sankaku_class.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 165px;" />;<br />;专家比新手能看到更多的专业知识梯度，这使得新手很难理解为什么专家擅长他们所做的事情。这种缺乏理解也导致不同技能水平的自由职业者收取的费率存在差异。客户大多是新手，无法区分技能树高端的从业者，而专家可以。这意味着在达到一定的技能水平后，通过经验取得的任何改进都是看不见的<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ability-to-see-expertise-is-a-milestone-worth-aiming-for" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36784864" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hacker news.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;21世纪论文中的17世纪字体</stitle>; <id>;https://www.linyangchen.com/Typography-Fell-Types-font</id>; <updated>;2023-07-20T21:56:11.291356Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.linyangchen.com/Typography- Fell-Types-font"/>; <作者>; <名称>;_emacsomancer_</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=_emacsomancer_</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://photos.smugmug.com/photos/i-G9xQbXV/0/X3/i-G9xQbXV-X3.jpg" style="width: 220 像素； height: 266px;" />;<br />;作者在博士论文中讨论了他们对数字字体的不满以及对模拟凸版印刷的方法的探索。他们发现了 Fell 字体，这是 Caslon 所源自的原始字体的数字化版本，并在论文中使用了它。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-17th- century-font-in-a-21st- century-论文" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36807108" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;重新审视“Cansole”，因为我的电视没有合适的连接器</stitle >; <id>;https://blog.jgc.org/2023/07/revisiting-cansole-my-silly-pong-game.html</id>; <更新>;2023-07-21T08:56:11.292774Z</更新>; <link href="https://blog.jgc.org/2023/07/revisiting-cansole-my-silly-pong-game.html" />; <author>; <name>;jgrahamc</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jgrahamc</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEinVSvft8sROXwwRAOm1kxwamwfS_9EbqjaU6oGxF7p6 t8_Wu0BRijsJPLV9zXcPeEgVz_0Bc0rkpsC0soHcCHNniS9UXYFhkEVg_SOLYibzUZI21jDs7sl4rOcBf65Ceu_WIhr5J7GOhzQRdjcw897IGDletiPTPMt3BwWHRbWg-GGZfuwpc6XoQ/w640-h4 80/Untitled.002.jpg" style="宽度: 220px; height: 165px;" />;<br />;早在 2011 年，Cansole 是一个罐装视频游戏机，它是使用 Arduino Pro、电阻器和来自 M&S 的甜罐子创建的。但是，作者最近发现他们的电视只有 HDMI 输入，因此他们订购了一个复合到 HDMI 转换器。Cansole 使用连接到 RCA 连接器的两个电阻器生成黑白复合视频图像。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#revisit ing-the-cansole-because-my-tv-doesn-t-have-the-right-connectors" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36783062" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题type="text">;Oxide 计算机：文档</stitle>; <id>;https://docs.icide.computer/guides/introduction</id>; <updated>;2023-07-20T20:56:11.293572Z</updated>; <link href="https://docs.oxy.computer/guides/introduction"/>; <author>; <name>;avrong</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=avrong </uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Oxide Computer 是一个高效的机架级计算系统，配有硬件和软件。在开发人员生产力方面，它具有与云超大规模基础设施相同的许多优势，但长期基础设施成本却低得多。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#oxy-computer-docs" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36806539" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Nano第二个时间戳冲突很常见</stitle>; <id>;https://www.evanjones.ca/nanosecond-collisions.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T07:56:11.294379Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.evanjones.ca/nanosecond-collisions.html"/>; <author>; <name>;ingve</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator。 com/user?id=ingve</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;我写了一个小测试程序，用来比较 Go 中的“绝对”时间和“单调时钟”记录的连续时间戳和绝对时间戳之间的相对差异。该行为取决于系统，在 Mac OS X 和 Linux 上观察到的结果不同。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#nanosecond-timestamp-collisions-are-common" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36810818" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;LLM Constellation</stitle>; <id>;https://llmconstellation.olafblitz.repl.co/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-21T05:56:11.296884Z</updated>; <link href="https://llmconstellation.olafblitz.repl.co/"/>; <作者>; <name>;fzliu</name>; <uri>;https://news.xml">; ycombinator.com/user?id=fzliu</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#llm-constellation" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36810230" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;撇开好莱坞电影不谈，奥本海默到底有多优秀的物理学家？</stitle>; <id>;https://www.science.org/content/article/movie-adds-oppenheimer-s-celebrity-just-how-good-physicalist-was-he</id>; <updated>;2023-07-20T23:56:11 .297679Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.science.org/content/article/movie-adds-oppenheimer-s-celebrity-just-how-good-physicalist-was-he"/>; <作者>; <name>;andrewl</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=andrewl</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat. io/#hollywood-movie-aside-just-how-good-a-physicalist-was-oppenheimer" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36808001" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml ">; <title type="text">;邀请秘密社团</stitle>; <id>;https://www.experimental-history.com/p/an-invitation-to-a-secret-society</id>; <updated>;2023-07-20T22:56:11.298486Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.experimental-history.com/p/an-invitation-to-a-secret -society"/>; <author>; <name>;surprisetalk</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=surprisetalk</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_120,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s 3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F548f103c-9c2a-4e20-aa3f-c0cec659b902_1194x1523.jpeg" style="width: 220px; height: 281px;" />;<br />;我邀请每一位好奇的人去做科学并在互联网上分享。科学研究​​需要更多元的声音和想法。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#an-invitation-to-a-secret-society" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36807763" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;FedNow 上线</stitle>; <id>;https://www.federalreserve.gov/newsevents/pressreleases/other20230720a.htm</id>; <更新>;2023-07-20T15:56： 11.299269Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.federalreserve.gov/newsevents/pressreleases/other20230720a.htm"/>; <author>; <name>;lavp</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=lavp</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.federalreserve.gov/images/social -media/social-default-image-opengraph.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 116px;" />;<br />;美联储宣布其新的即时支付系统 FedNow 服务现已上线。该工具允许银行和信用社为客户即时转账，使日常支付更快、更方便。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#fednow-is-live" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id= 36801491" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Hipgnosis，改变唱片套的设计师</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theguardian.com/film/2023/jul/03/anton-corbijn-hipgnosis-film-pink-floyd -led-zeppelin</id>; <更新>;2023-07-21T01:56:11.300059Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.theguardian.com/film/2023/jul/03/anton-corbijn-hipgnosis-film-pink-floyd-led-zeppelin"/>; <作者>; <name>;8bitsrule</name>; <uri>;https://news.y combinator.com/user?id=8bitsrule</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i.guim.co.uk/img/media/43bf707f76869042b60eb12f6a5f68427c96a378/1110_156_2557_2557/master/2557.jpg?width=120 &dpr=1&s=无" style="宽度：220px;高度：220px;" />;<br />;以其摄影和音乐视频而闻名的安东·科尔宾 (Anton Corbijn) 执导了一部关于专辑封面设计先驱 Hipgnosis 唱片封套的纪录片。该纪录片采访了 Pink Floyd、Led Zeppelin 和 Paul McCartney 等乐队和艺术家，展示了 Hipgnosis 的创意和创意组合。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#hipgnosis-the-designers -who-changed-the-record-sleeve" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36797324" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;子像素距离变换</stitle>; <id >;https://acko.net/blog/subpixel-distance-transform/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T02:56:11.300835Z</updated>; <link href="https://acko.net/blog/subpixel-distance-transform/"/>; <author>; <name>;signa11</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=signa11</uri>; </author >; <content type="html">;<img src="https://acko.net/files/esdt/cover.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;本文讨论了有符号距离场 (SDF) 在文本渲染中的使用。它解释了生成 SDF 的过程以及实现亚像素精度所面临的挑战。作者还描述了他们的项目 Use.GPU 中使用的一种新颖的亚像素精确距离变换 (ESDT)。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#sub-pixel-distance-transform" target="_blank">;[summary]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36809404" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;研究发现微波加热容器时释放出数十亿纳米塑料</stitle>; <id>;https://news.unl.edu/newsrooms/today /article/nebraska-study-finds-billions-of-nano Plastics-released-when-microwaving/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-21T03:56:11.301610Z</更新>; <link href="https://news.unl.edu/newsrooms/today/article/nebraska-study-finds-billions-of-nano Plastics-release d-when-microwaving/"/>; <author>; <name>;thunderbong</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=thunderbong</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://news.unl.edu/sites/default/files/styles/large_aspect/public/media/Hero_323.jpg?itok=VrSN38Hg" style="width: 22 0 像素；高度：124px;" />;<br />;微波塑料婴儿食品容器会释放大量塑料颗粒，包括每平方厘米容器数十亿个纳米塑料和数百万个微塑料。食用这些颗粒对健康的影响仍不清楚，但实验表明它们可能对肾细胞有毒。了解食物中塑料颗粒的数量并限制接触它们非常重要。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#study-find s-billions-of-nano Plastics-released-when-microwaving-containers" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36809565" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;安藤百福发明了方便面（2016）</stitle>; <id>;https://www.vox.com/2015/3/5/8150929/momofuku-ando-ramen-instant-noodles</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T00:56:11.302408Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.vox.com/2015 /3/5/8150929/momofuku-ando-ramen-instant-noodles"/>; <author>; <name>;thunderbong</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=thunderbong</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.vox-cdn.com/thumbor/VrFvA9FXiEkez-eXQm1 7xdMoxpg=/0x0:2832x2121/1200x0/filters:focal(0x0:2832x2121):no_upscale()/cdn.vox-cdn.com/uploads/chorus_asset/file/3470748/51791749.0.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 165px;" />;<br />;方便面的发明者安藤百福已成为各地美食家的英雄。方便面被评为日本 20 世纪顶级发明。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#momofuku-ando-invented-instant-ramen-2016" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36782487" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Lit：简单、快速的 Web 组件</stitle>; <id>;https://lit.dev/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-20T21:56:11 .303195Z</updated>; <link href="https://lit.dev/"/>; <作者>; <name>;tambourine_man</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=tambourine_man</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://lit.dev/images/logo-whitebg-padded-1600x800.png" style="width: 220px; height: 111px;" />;<br />;Lit 组件是可在手写 HTML 或框架代码中使用的标准自定义元素。它们非常高效，并且每当反应性属性发生更改时都会重新渲染。Lit 可以轻松构建适合每个团队的 Web 组件。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#lit-simple-fast-web-components" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator. com/item?id=36806747" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我美丽的朋友</stitle>; <id>;https://thepointmag.com/examined-life/my-beautiful-friend/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-20T23： 56:11.303978Z</updated>; <link href="https://thepointmag.com/examined-life/my-beautiful-friend/"/>; <author>; <name>;jger15</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jger15</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://thepointmag.com/wp-content/uploads/2023 /07/Christie_PrudenceFlint_web4.jpg" style="宽度：220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;作者反思了她意识到自己永远不可能成为大美人以及这对她自尊的影响。她探讨了她与一位美丽朋友的友谊动态以及她对她的嫉妒和怨恨。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#my-beautiful-friend" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=36807071" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;No-more-secrets：重现 1992 年电影《运动鞋》中的解密效果</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/bartobri/no-more-secrets</id>; <更新>;2023-07-20T13:56:11.304772Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/bartobri/no-more-secrets"/>; <author>; <name>;tambourine_man</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=tambourine_man</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://camo.githubusercontent.com /68bbd6c555003c61a5e865edaf317f370a7b35544abb59a85ce179fde58f626f/68747470733a2f2f7777772e627269616e626172746f2e696e666f2f73746174 69632f6e6d732f6e6d732e676966"样式="宽度：220px； height: 125px;" />;<br />;该项目提供了一个名为 nms 的命令行工具，它重现了 1992 年黑客电影 Sneakers 中屏幕上出现的著名数据解密效果。它适用于管道数据，显示加密数据，然后显示原始纯文本字符。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#no-more-secrets-recreate-the-decryption-effect-seen-in-the-1992- movie-sneakers" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36799776" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;理查德·罗兹 (Richard Rhodes) 写了一本关于奥本海默和原子的经典书籍炸弹</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theatlantic.com/technology/archive/2023/07/richard-rhodes-making-of-the-atomic-bomb-ai/674777/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-20T21:56:11.305609Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.theatlantic.com/technology/archive/2023/ 07/richard-rhodes-making-of-the-atomic-bomb-ai/674777/"/>; <作者>; <name>;胡克</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Hooke</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/1tVnLk7bxG-lNG_8oCyX236 pyy0=/0x117:1000x1367/648x810/media/img/2023/07/20/_IAN8067_1/original.jpg" style="width: 220px;高度：275px;" />;<br />;《原子弹的制造》一书的作者理查德·罗德斯反思了核武器的发展与当前构建人工智能的竞赛之间的相似之处。他讨论了围绕人工智能的道德担忧，以及对人工智能可能变得比人类更聪明并变得流氓的担忧。罗德斯强调了互补性的概念，即武器可以同时成为和平的工具，并警告说，如果不小心控制，人工智能系统可能会违背其预期目的。<a href=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/#richard-rhodes-wrote-a-classic-book-about-oppenheimer-and-the-atomic-bomb" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36806922" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我们如何制作 MuseScore 4 [视频]</stitle>; <id>;https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qct6LKbneKQ</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T02:56:11.306383Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qct6LKb neKQ"/>; <author>; <name>;maybevain</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=maybevain</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<iframe src="//www.youtube.com/embed/Qct6LKbneKQ"frameborder="0"allowfullscreen loading="lazy">;</iframe>; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-we-made -musescore-4-video" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36804692" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;硬件黑客 (2004) [pdf]</stitle >; <id>;http://www.nicolascollins.com/texts/originalhackingmanual.pdf</id>; <更新>;2023-07-21T00:56:11.307242Z</updated>; <link href="http://www.nicolascollins.com/texts/originalhackingmanual.pdf"/>; <作者>; <name>;ynac</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user ?id=ynac</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;本文是硬件黑客指南，涵盖电路嗅探、焊接和创建自制电路等主题。它强调了在探索电子设备时无所畏惧和充满信心的重要性。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#hardware-hacking-2004-pdf" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36808679" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;TypeChat</stitle>; <id>;https://microsoft.github.io/TypeChat/blog/introducing-typechat/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-20T16:56:11.309538Z</updated>; <link href="https://microsoft.github.io/TypeChat/blog/introducing-typechat/"/>; <author>; <name>;DanRosenwasser</name>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=DanRosenwasser</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;TypeChat 是 Microsoft 发布的一个实验性库，旨在将大型语言模型集成到现有的应用程序界面中。它使用代码库中的类型定义来检索类型安全的结构化 AI 响应。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#typechat" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36803124" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;FTC 警告桌游内容创作者、发行商披露关系</stitle>; <id>;https://boardgamewire.com/index.php/2023/07/17/ftc-warns-board-game-influencers-publishers-over-failing-to-properly-disclose-relationships-free-gifts/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T00:56:11.310313Z</updated>; < link href="https://boardgamewire.com/index.php/2023/07/17/ftc-warns-board-game-influencers-publishers-over-failing-to-properly-disclose-relationships-free-gifts/"/>; <author>; <name>;webmaven</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=webmaven</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;棋盘游戏评论者影响者未能正确披露他们何时收到免费游戏，这使他们自己和发行商面临被法庭诉讼的风险。美国联邦贸易委员会更新了其指南，将在线影响者纳入其中，并指出每个媒体的信息披露应简单且突出。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ftc-warns-board-game-content-creators-publishers-to-disclose-relationships" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36808430" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
